task.summary: Default task
Populated Winter 2017 and Y1S2 Research Diaries.
Updated Research Diary.
Checked Parseval's theorem up until taking the powerspectrum of the map. Checked if code can accurately recreate scan strategies and recompress maps correctly. Populated research diary accordingly.
Checked Parseval's Theorem for Srini's code including radial averaging. Populated Research Diary.
Updated Plots directory
More Checking on PSV theorem
Updated Research Diary
Setting version the same on laptop and uni computer
Populated Research Diary after meeting. Made inital modifications to code.
Added Plots
Investigated 2 bit digitisation. Sped up some of the disigitsation code and moved noise creation to a more sensible position.
Investigated 1bit digitisation, focusing on p*k*(k+1).
Investigated 1 bit digitisation effect on p*k(k+1)
Meeting with Christian
Meeting with Christian. Populated Research Diary and investigated effect of number of observations on 1bit digitisation.
Investigated Different Digitisation Schemes for 20 Obs, 1&2Bit.
Meeting with Christian. Preparation for running MPI code on cloud.
Obtained Result for many CMB seeds. Began to investigate ratio and difference in powerspectrum. Removed results from git, since they are too large and are kept on the sptcloud data anyway.
Obtained Result for many CMB seeds. Began to investigate ratio and difference in powerspectrum. Removed results from git, since they are too large and are kept on the sptcloud data anyway.
Reinvestigated Parselval's theorem and how setting the digitisation levels arbitrarily changes the resulting powerspectrum.

Continued investigation on following the Power through from CL2D to the final observation. Produced plots showing that there is still some power missing, but that it is most likely in the formulation of CL2D (can this be?).
Fixed CL2D creation code. Investigated power for different field sizes and resolution combinations.
Fixed power issues. Set noise level appropriately. Chagned code to set digitisation levels arbitrarily. Found that a very high level of noise is being induced.
Fixed digitisation of map. now investigating correct noise level.
Worked on normalisation of map. Wrote a script for fixed noise level to run on the cloud.
Collected and analysed data for fixed detector noise level on spt cloud. prepared code for a larger scale to run on NERSC.
ran and analysed NERSC code. Found equivalent map noise levels.
added polarisation code form srini
added polarisation code form srini
